ActorTalk: I see... A lot of shops are running promotions after the Commercial District renovation. This event must be one of them.
It's a great chance for Gray Raven to experience something together.
I've entered the coordinates Liv sent into the terminal. Let's head out, Commandant.
Then let's bring back some gifts for him. It can be our way of making up for it.
Yes. We'll make sure of it.
Too bad Lee couldn't join us.
Hope Lee can come along next time.
